mHTvjGcRf9yC92BWO.name: Oxygen Storage
mHTvjGcRf9yC92BWO.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

m1UKdmGtdkKZ2nbgn.name: Oxygen Storage
m1UKdmGtdkKZ2nbgn.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

m05fCqIBBgiw_VvSB.name: Oxygen Storage
m05fCqIBBgiw_VvSB.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

m3pDJnBV_7_aQgUCW.name: Oxygen Storage
m3pDJnBV_7_aQgUCW.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

mcrodck-jlyYxo-wu.name: Oxygen Storage
mcrodck-jlyYxo-wu.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

tsVzr8Qd0cqzi9VOb.name: Flight
tsVzr8Qd0cqzi9VOb.notes: Air Move is Basic Speed x 2 (drop all fractions)

mcPGwyHU-huivzpqo.name: Diffuse
mcPGwyHU-huivzpqo.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

mKsqagJbhmF9yFNDG.name: Homogenous
mKsqagJbhmF9yFNDG.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

msrKme3Nw51mPVxnn.name: No Blood
msrKme3Nw51mPVxnn.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

mIZa0j9vsicLBwTBe.name: No Brain
mIZa0j9vsicLBwTBe.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

m-pV7_-SPParWMn7c.name: No Eyes
m-pV7_-SPParWMn7c.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

m4bqqUoIXR2M7PZUh.name: No Head
m4bqqUoIXR2M7PZUh.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

myTWUNgjsLZh4jVI3.name: No Neck
myTWUNgjsLZh4jVI3.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

mf0oiH3zK1QzvQ2HK.name: No Vitals
mf0oiH3zK1QzvQ2HK.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

mnrKUHBL1JvyGGVem.name: Unliving
mnrKUHBL1JvyGGVem.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5
